complaints.complaint: Yaar, Lucknow mein paani ka bahut dikkat ho rahi hai. Raat ko paani nahi milta. Bahut pareshani ho rahi hai.
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily life and hygiene

complaints.complaint: Kanpur ke hospital mein doctor kaafi busy hote hain. Jaldi se checkup nahi hota, aur time waste ho jata hai.
complaints.socialImpact: Delayed medical treatment and health risks
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of work hours, increased healthcare costs

complaints.complaint: Agra mein gali gali mein police ka koi asar nahi hai. Chhote chhote crime ho rahe hain, par koi action nahi ho raha.
complaints.socialImpact: Increased fear and insecurity among residents
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of business due to crime

complaints.complaint: Varanasi mein bijli ka connection bahut weak hai. Kabhi bhi light chali jati hai aur kaafi time baad aati hai.
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily activities

complaints.complaint: Bareilly ke main roads bilkul khatam ho gaye hain. Gaadi chalana mushkil ho gaya hai, har jagah potholes hain.
complaints.socialImpact: Increased travel time and accidents

complaints.complaint: Noida mein bus services bilkul nahi hain. Pichle 3 mahine se koi bus timely nahi aayi.
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily commute and business
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of work hours and productivity

complaints.complaint: Aligarh mein garbage collection kaafi gadbad hai. Gali gali kachra pada rehta hai aur smell aati hai.
complaints.socialImpact: Health hazards and unhygienic conditions

complaints.complaint: Meerut mein government hospital mein sabhi medicines nahi milti. I had to buy from outside, which is very costly.
complaints.socialImpact: Delayed medical treatment and health risks

complaints.complaint: Ghaziabad ke schools mein quality of education down ho gayi hai. Bachche padhayi mein interested nahi rahte.
complaints.socialImpact: Decline in educational standards

complaints.complaint: Moradabad mein police ka response bahut slow hai. Crime badh raha hai aur log dar se ghar nahi nikal rahe.
complaints.socialImpact: Increased fear and insecurity among residents
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of business due to crime

complaints.complaint: Mathura mein paani ka pressure kaafi low hai. Subah-subah paani aata hai, lekin bahut kam quantity mein.
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily life and hygiene

complaints.complaint: Agra mein light jaane ka time fix nahi hai. Din mein light chali jati hai aur subah tak nahi aati.
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily activities

complaints.complaint: Kanpur mein garbage ka system bohot bekar hai. Ghar ke aas-paas kachra padah rehta hai, koi safai nahi hoti.
complaints.socialImpact: Health hazards and unhygienic conditions

complaints.complaint: Lucknow mein public transport ka system itna inefficient hai ki aapko bus ya auto ke liye lambe time tak wait karna padta hai.
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily commute and business
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of work hours and productivity

complaints.complaint: Badaun mein roads bohot khatarnak hain. Gaddhe aur potholes se gaddi chalana mushkil ho gaya hai.
complaints.socialImpact: Increased travel time and accidents

complaints.complaint: Firozabad mein police patrolling kaafi weak hai. Logon ko dar lagta hai kyunki crime badh gaya hai.
complaints.socialImpact: Increased fear and insecurity among residents
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of business due to crime

complaints.complaint: Varanasi mein bijli jaane ke baad kaafi time lagta hai aane mein. Kaafi baar dikhata hai ‘Load Shedding’
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily activities

complaints.complaint: Ayodhya mein paani ki supply kaafi kam ho gayi hai. Pani ke tanker kaafi time baad aate hain.
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily life and hygiene

complaints.complaint: Shahjahanpur mein garbage collection kaafi irregular hai. Kachra gali gali mein padah rehta hai.
complaints.socialImpact: Health hazards and unhygienic conditions

complaints.complaint: Aligarh ke hospital mein emergency services bilkul nahi hain. Jab zarurat hoti hai toh koi help nahi milti.
complaints.socialImpact: Delayed medical treatment and health risks

complaints.complaint: Bareilly mein roads itni khatarnak hain, gaadi chalana impossible ho gaya hai. Bohot accidents ho rahe hain.
complaints.socialImpact: Increased travel time and accidents

complaints.complaint: यार, लखनऊ में पानी की बहुत दिक्कत हो रही है। रात को पानी नहीं मिलता। बहुत परेशानी हो रही है।
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily life and hygiene

complaints.complaint: कानपुर के अस्पताल में डॉक्टर काफी व्यस्त रहते हैं। जल्दी से चेकअप नहीं होता, और समय बर्बाद हो जाता है।
complaints.socialImpact: Delayed medical treatment and health risks
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of work hours, increased healthcare costs

complaints.complaint: आगरा में गलियों में पुलिस का कोई असर नहीं है। छोटे-छोटे अपराध हो रहे हैं, पर कोई एक्शन नहीं हो रहा।
complaints.socialImpact: Increased fear and insecurity among residents
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of business due to crime

complaints.complaint: वाराणसी में बिजली का कनेक्शन बहुत कमजोर है। कभी भी लाइट चली जाती है और काफी समय बाद आती है।
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily activities

complaints.complaint: बरेली के मुख्य मार्ग पूरी तरह से खराब हो गए हैं। गाड़ी चलाना मुश्किल हो गया है, हर जगह गड्ढे हैं।
complaints.socialImpact: Increased travel time and accidents

complaints.complaint: नोएडा में बस सेवाएं बिल्कुल नहीं हैं। पिछले 3 महीने से कोई बस समय पर नहीं आई।
complaints.socialImpact: Disruption of daily commute and business
complaints.economicImpact: Loss of work hours and productivity
